_header: Live not as a glutton still for to eat
_description: On moderate diet — one couplet preceded by Non uiuas ut edas sed edas ut iuere possis

DULCosViii9.Transcription:
Lyve not as a glutton styll for to eateBut feede to maintayne lyf by
                    thie meate
